questions.question: How do I install Davemane42's Custom Node for ComfyUI?
questions.answer: Navigate to the `/ComfyUI/custom_nodes/` folder, `git clone git clone https://github.com/Davemane42/ComfyUI_Dave_CustomNode`, and start ComfyUI.

questions.question: What does the MultiAreaConditioning 2.4 node allow you to do?
questions.answer: The MultiAreaConditioning 2.4 node allows you to visualize the ConditioningSetArea node for better control and comes with a ConditioningUpscale node useful for high-resolution fix workflow.

questions.question: What is the use of the ConditioningUpscale node?
questions.answer: The ConditioningUpscale node is useful for high-resolution fix workflow.

questions.question: What is included in the MultiLatentComposite 1.1 node?
questions.answer: The MultiLatentComposite 1.1 node allows you to visualize the MultiLatentComposite node for better control.

questions.question: What is one known issue with MultiLatentComposite 1.1?
questions.answer: One known issue with MultiLatentComposite 1.1 is that it does not check for out of bound layers.
